page.title: 03Beavers
page.content: {Beaver colony}started in{1982}with 27 boys,in 1985 two colonies with 48 boys aged 6-7 years led by leader and assistant leaders from{4th Horley {Scout}Group.It meets Thurs. /Fri. evenings from 6.15- 7.15.Activities as follows:craft work,masks for Halloween,followed by a fancy dress party.Make Guy for Salfords bonfire on Nov. 5th.Christmas cards and gifts, gifts, party,songs around the campfire,serve tea and mince pies to parents.Talks from visitors.Summer activities outside,games, treasure hunts, making dens etc. Summer 1985 helped with '75 years of Scouting and Guiding celebrations.' Went to Scout camp, Bar.B.Q.and Campfire with parents.Indian theme for day, collected wood for fires and bows and arrows.Made totem Poles, wigwams. {"Fun and Friends"- Beaver moto.
